name: First American Financial Corporation
description: First American Financial Corporation is a leading provider of title insurance, settlement services, and risk solutions for real estate transactions. Founded in 1889 and headquartered in Santa Ana, California, the company operates through its Title Insurance and Services segment, which includes a wide range of services such as title insurance, title examinations, closings, and escrow services. First American has a strong presence in the United States and provides its services to both residential and commercial real estate markets. The company is committed to leveraging technology to improve the efficiency and accuracy of real estate transactions, offering innovative tools and solutions such as digital closing experiences and online transaction management systems. With a legacy of reliability and an extensive network of agents and underwriters, First American is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of its clients in an increasingly dynamic real estate environment. The company's mission is to provide peace of mind and security in real estate transactions, ensuring that clients can navigate the complexities of property ownership with confidence. First American also places a strong emphasis on corporate responsibility, participating in various initiatives to support community development and sustainable practices.

seo.meta_title: First American Financial Corporation | Title Insurance and Settlement Services
seo.meta_description: First American Financial Corporation provides title insurance and settlement services for real estate transactions. Discover how we ensure peace of mind in property ownership.

faq.question: What services does First American offer?
faq.answer: First American offers title insurance, closing, and escrow services, among other real estate solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First American?
faq.answer: Denise G. Thoren is the CEO of First American Financial Corporation.

faq.question: Where is First American headquartered?
faq.answer: First American is headquartered in Santa Ana, California, USA.
